binding:binding.name: LG TV Serial binding
binding:binding.description:
For controlling LG TV using seial (RS232C) protocol. Simple unidirectional communication with just the features the author needed.
References: https://sites.google.com/site/brendanrobert/projects/bits-and-pieces/lg-tv-hacks https://code.google.com/archive/p/lg-tv-command/source/default/source https://www.lg.com/us/commercial/documents/m6503ccba-owner-manual.pdf
binding:binding.author: Famake
